name: GetSet Blur + Set Talc-Free Pressed Setting Powder
about: What it is: A talc-free, safe for sensitive skin setting powder that blurs and smooths skin and makes any base transfer-proof and sweat-resistant..Highlighted Ingredients: - Kaolin Clay: Gentle on sensitive skin and controls shine..- Squalane: Delivers hydration and nourishment to skin..- Hydrophobic Silica: Improves sweat-resistance and the look of skin elasticity...Ingredient Callouts: Free of parabens, phthalates, and contains less than one percent synthetic fragrance. It is also vegan and cruelty-free...What Else You Need to Know: A gentler alternative to setting spray, this alcohol-free powder sets makeup to last all day without leaving skin dry or cakey. Infused with hydrating squalane, it feels lightweight, breathable, and diffuses skin texture with a soft matte finish. This powder is non-irritating, derm-approved, clinically proven...Clinical Results: Based on a third-party test with 34 participants:.- 94% agree that powder feels breathable.- 94% agree skin looked smoother.- 94% agree the powder controlled and reduced shine
ingredients: -Kaolin Clay: Gentle on sensitive skin and controls shine..-Squalane: Delivers hydration and nourishment to skin..-Hydrophobic Silica: Improves sweat-resistance and the look of skin elasticity...Mica, Kaolin, Silica, Aluminum Starch Octenylsuccinate, Methyl Methacrylate Crosspolymer, Pentaerythrityl Tetraisostearate, Cellulose, Squalane, Synthetic Wax, Lauroyl Lysine, Sorbitan Isostearate, Trihydroxystearin, Silica Dimethyl Silylate, Dimethicone, Dicaprylyl Carbonate, Magnesium Myristate, Glyceryl Caprylate, 1,2-Hexanediol, Methicone, Ethylhexylglycerin, Triethoxycaprylylsilane,  +/- May Contain/Peut Contenir: Iron Oxides (CI 77491, CI 77492, CI 77499), Ultramarines (CI 77007), Red 6 Lake (CI 15850), Red 7 Lake (CI 15850), Yellow 5 Lake (CI 19140).
how_to_use: Suggested Usage:.-Tap on skin with a powder puff or all over with a fluffy brush for dreamy, diffused skin.

But after only using GetSet powder a handful of times, I feel much more confident in my powder game! I don’t need too much and from the little that I put on, I can see that it helps to smooth and brighten my skin, set my makeup and reduce any shine. I am excited to keep using it and letting it elevate my routine and make my makeup last through my crazy days! I have the shade Balboa Banana and it’s perfect for my medium skin tone.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Another amazing new product from Tower28, and I’m already so obsessed! I have this powder in the shade Palisades Pink.  It is incredibly lightweight, making it feel like I’m not wearing anything at all. What really stands out to me is its blurring effect— it smooths out my complexion beautifully, giving my skin a flawless, airbrushed look without looking cakey or heavy.  It reminds me of the Charlotte Tilbury pressed powder, but at a much better price point and added brightening effect! The finish is natural, with just the right amount of matte without dulling my skin's radiance. It also does a great job of controlling shine throughout the day, which is a huge plus for me. The powder is buildable, so I can add a little more on days when I need extra coverage without it ever feeling thick. Overall, this is a fantastic face powder for anyone looking for a lightweight, blurring effect that still lets your skin breathe. It’s definitely going to become a staple in my makeup routine!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love the texture of this powder. Don’t let the white pan scare you. I thought it was going to be chalky and too light on my face however, upon application, it blends seamlessly into the skin. It also works well with my other products. For the sole purpose of testing the powder, I used this to set my tinted sunscreen around 8am and by the end of the night my face was a tad patchy and my t-zone was oily. I did not blot during the day on purpose to see the performance. When I got home around 8/9pm, I did blot and while it got rid of the shine, you can see that the make up underneath has separated. I still want to try it with an actual foundation and perhaps use it to freshen up through the day. I love the signature T28 lilac color but I do wish that the compact came with a mirror and perhaps a small puff to make touch ups easier.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I love that the ingredients are safe for sensitive skin, and the powder worked really well to blur and set my my makeup! Definitely recommend for anyone!!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love the natural yet blurring effect after using the GetSet Powder. It leaves the skin looking like a real airbrush filter! Easy to wear throughout the day and doesn’t crease :)

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: It is insane how immediate the blurring effect of this powder is! The second you press it into your skin, all of your pores disappear and your skin looks so smooth. It kept my concealer on all day through the 94-degree weather, and I never had to reapply. Like every Tower28 product that comes out, this is my new go-to!

reviews.review_title: a very good natural blurring powder
reviews.review_text: honestly, I didn't realize at first that it was a translucent powder, and I'm even more glad it was when I found out. it's a nice natural pressed powder that blurs my pores and gives my face a very natural slightly blurred look. If you are looking for full coverage, maybe skip this one as this is more meant for the natural, clean girls!  I love it as a natural everyday pressed powder to keep my oily skin in check throughout the day!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Combination skin

I can almost do a full face routine with just this powder. Yay, so excited for this launch! You need to try it!!
